name: Issuing the new document via QR code
scenarioId: android/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel-Issue_Identity_attestations_65/photoIDCrossDevice:Issuing the new document via QR code
methodName: Issuing the new document via QR code

testSteps.description: Given the user is presented with the credential details to be issued
When the user presses on the ISSUE button
Then the user should be redirected to the issuer service for authentication and consent

userStory.narrative:
As a user of the EUDI Wallet
  I want to request and store photo ID attestations in my EUDI Wallet
  So that I can identify myself using my EUDI Wallet in my travel user journey by presenting the requested attestations

title: Issuing the new document via QR code
